participant_1.background:
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
i am hoping to find someone to marry me.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
i was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains.

participant_2.background:
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.
I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i hate to lose.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going so far?
Hey! My day is going well so far, thanks for asking! What about you?
My day is going well! Just got back from hiking in the mountains and I am really enjoying the fresh air.
Hiking in the mountains sounds really fun! I wish I could go hiking more often. I spend most of my time practicing my music.
That's cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play a variety of instruments, but my main instrument is the piano. I also play the guitar and ukulele.
Wow, that's awesome! I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I haven't played in a long time.
You should pick it up again! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
I might have to do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
I'm going to go get some lunch now. What are you up to for the rest of the day?
I'm going to practice my music for a little while longer, then I'm going to go see a movie with my friends.
Sounds like a fun day! Enjoy!
